messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Both tyrone negrone and  connor paynter attacked the captain and are as such deemed a danger and must be took down

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Everyone concerned about the cult of narsie, remain calm while we explain.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: And Cease your violence.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The cult of narsie has sent an ambassador to our station, to make better relations to the cult and to hopefully make peace.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: If you do not stop attacking your fellow crew, action will be taken. Break it up. All of you.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Now that the violence is hopefully out of the way, you may join the cult if you wish. Do not attack or raid them. They are starting an embassary in the chapel.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Kill gregory wright on site hes a murderer

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also kill connor on site for attempting to blow us all up

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: EVERYBODY KILL GREGORY WRIGHT FOR ATTEMPTED MURDER

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Wheres the lights

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Captain i have gregs body at the bridge

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Who took the stuff greg has

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: KILL SOLID SNAKE

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attempted murder

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a swarm of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to an overwhelming number of civvilian casualties and the captains death we will be retunring you back to the recovery ship for a debriefing
